item.title: Specflow Basics
item.description: You can write tests in non-techinical way as below using specflow. Specflow is an open source extension available in visual studio, that lets you to write specifications using Gherkin syntax. Just if you are aware about cucumber for BDD approach, then specflow is cucumber for .net. Example feature file # Example Feature file: Feature: Calculator In order to avoid silly mistakes As a math idiot I want to be told the sum of two numbers @mytag
